column1: mrs. norma sue wyatt| mrs. norma sue wyatt
column12: she was the daughter of the late luther and nina (york) thompson. she was a librarian and book mobile driver and retired after 20 years of service with the marshall county public library. she was a member of the eastern star and marshall county homemakers. she was a member of first baptist church of benton. mrs. wyatt is survived by her husband of 66 years percy ray wyatt; son
column13: stephen r. wyatt and his wife cheryl of lexington
column15: cynthia bradshaw and her husband joseph of cape girardeau
column19: ky and marilyn mullany of nipomo
column20: ca. mrs. wyatt was preceded in death by her parents; brother
column23: lou eva seay and wanda jean warmath. funeral service will be held at 2:00 pm on tuesday june 16
column24: 2015 in the chapel of collier funeral home with rev. bill lawson officiating. burial will follow in benton cemetery
column26: ky. visitation will be held on monday june 15
column27: 2015 between the hours of 5:00 pm and 8:00 pm at collier funeral home
